EmailTemplate.description: Email template to remind resources to enter their timecards.
EmailTemplate.name: PSA Missing Timecard Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Missing Timecard Alert! : {!pse__Missing_Timecard__c.pse__Resource__c} - Week-ending: {!pse__Missing_Timecard__c.pse__End_Date__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!pse__Missing_Timecard__c.pse__Resource__c},
You have not entered your timecard for the week of {!pse__Missing_Timecard__c.pse__Start_Date__c} to {!pse__Missing_Timecard__c.pse__End_Date__c}
Please review your open assignments and submit any relevant timecard(s) ASAP!
Click here to login to PSA: login.salesforce.com.
